name: XWUI Back To Top Component
description: Floating button component that appears when user scrolls down, allowing quick return to the top of the page. Supports custom positioning, smooth scrolling, and visibility threshold.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

visible.description: Whether the button is initially visible

threshold.description: Scroll distance in pixels before button becomes visible

position.description: Position of the button on the screen

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the button

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string to display in the button
